response.overview: Mark Seevers goes to Trump's inauguration, New Jersey's #1 Masturbator Tony Camarabi goes to the 2017 AVN awards and a father teaches his son how to dance to the Charlie Rose theme.  Pilot episode for a tv show that sadly did not get picked up.
response.tagline: What if piss smelled like shit?
response.title: TruthHunters
